ISSUE.TITLE: Video add on display product list view page in preview
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: nopCommerce 4.60-beta Steps to reproduce the problem: Step 1: Go to product edit page Step 2: Go to Multimedia panel Step 3: Select Video tab Step 4: Enter embed video URl and click on add product video button Step5: Grid in display product list view page in preview field ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82799708/206364333-746e2c12-c59e-4ba4-9d3e-a7a17bfe2db1.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6434 Added added missed initialization when reopening the checkout billing address

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6437 Use the IHttpClientFactory instead of manually creating HttClient
